summary.para: Gets shortcut menu restrictions that are currently set for the object.

param.name: dfmrMask
param.para: A bitwise combination of the values that specify the mask of the restrictions to get.

param.name: pdfmrValues
param.para: A bitwise combination of the values that specify the restrictions.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets context menu info for the object.

param.name: hwnd
param.para: A handle to the shortcut menu.

param.name: pcmcb
param.para: Type: *
The address of the object that defines the callback for the shortcut menu.

param.name: pidlFolder
param.para: Type: PCIDLIST_ABSOLUTE
The address of an item identifier list that specifies the folder of the items. If NULL, this is computed from the psf parameter.

param.name: psf
param.para: Type: *
The folder of the items.

param.name: cidl
param.para: Type: UINT
The count of items in the apidl parameter.

param.name: apidl
param.para: Type: PCUITEMID_CHILD_ARRAY
A pointer to an array of PIDL structures, each of which is an item to be operated on.

param.name: punkAssociation
param.para: Type: IUnknown*
The address of an object that specifies where to load extensions from.

param.name: cKeys
param.para: Type: UINT
The count of items in the aKeys parameter. May be zero.

param.name: aKeys
param.para: Type: const HKEY*
Specifies where to load extensions from.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

The CLSID for the object defines the shortcut menu handler.
